title: Can we pls buy keys with ip
body: Got so many boxes and 0 keys......

replies.body:
and then people would be asking to buy boxes with ip because sometimes I have like 5 keys and need to wait for my weekly boxes to refresh. Other times I have spare boxes and no keys. It'd be awesome if both were available for large amounts of ip but I doubt rito will do that because you know making money. 
We all feel this frustration but there's probably not going to be any changes made.

This is actually a good idea and should be implemented into the game. There's nothing more annoying than finally getting a chest and then having to win like 387839478746 games just to get the key shards to open it. 

If you think about it from a business perspective, Riot doesn't make much money from people buying key shards with RP, as most people aren't going to buy a key with RP, they are just going to wait for the key shards. However, Riot would probably make more profit from players spending about 2000 IP to buy a key.

Or even just increase the drop rate of key shards, I have five Hextech chests and I can't open a single one because key shards don't seem to like me. It's not like I don't win games too, I think I'm just super unlucky.
